reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A very stylish design hotel with a lot to offer and not too far from city centre!
reviews.title: Great design hotel experience

likes.liked: — The funky rooms. The loungy style.
likes.disliked: — A bad first encounter with a very arrogant front desk person

reviews.text: + We absolutely loved the funky rooms! The fantastic breakfast. The cosy lounge in the evening.
reviews.title: Good style!

reviews.text: + We liked the location and the fair price.
reviews.title: Great visit

likes.liked: — It was fun and very unusual, some parts sexy and seedy and other parts innocent and pure.

reviews.text: - We would have liked a not so arrogant service at the front desk the first time we visited the hotel. (We arrived at the hotel after having travelled from Austria by car in really warm weather, so we didn't really look as trendy as some of the other guests in the reception)
reviews.title: I would have expected something better...

reviews.text: Location is good in Berlin as I now and at check-in a small problem since I did order over internet. The staff is very polite and effective. I did choose this hotel because of the design and it was not so bad. I did get the feeling of a brothel when I go out of the elevator and to the rooms, and this is only because they have red lights in the hallway. Dont they have like this on brothels?;) Anyway, the place have good style, plays some Budda Bar music in hallways, have a very good bar and all over very cool design that you not often see at hotels.
reviews.title: Great Hotel - Friendly Staff

likes.liked: — friendly staff, very clean and comfortable, good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Q! seemed to be one of the different places we would be staying at during our European tour. It was correct at not having a sign out front. Parking was difficult as almost all spots in the adjacent garage were taken.
reviews.title: Beware of the construction
what a scam!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.text: The hotel was a bit tacky for my taste, and seemed to resemble more of a hotel geared for erotica. Shag carpeting and a cheesy wand to open your door. Neat room; unlike some reviewers we did have the hot tub next to the bed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel had loud bar downstairs, mainly frequented by older men and younger women. The younger women are eyeing the mens money. The men are ogling the women.
reviews.title: Modern boutique

reviews.text: The construction of the adjacent building the next day started exactly at 0800L. No way one could sleep though that. No warning was given for this, even though this appears to be an ongoing project.
reviews.title: Extremely dissapointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall the hotel was OK. Inquire about construction next door prior to getting the reservation.
reviews.title: Fantastic design hotel

reviews.text: A great hotel. After being on the road in Germany for several weeks and usually staying in boring business hotels I decided to try Q when I had a couple of days off in Berlin. Great service in the reception and in the bar, a nice clean room that is very different from the normal business-rooms I usually stay inn and a fantastic spa-area in the basement. The location is perfect in a nice part of Berlin with a lot of restaurants, cafes and shopping. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Great desing, friendly staff and not very expensive.
reviews.title: Great location and a different experience

reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights as a birthday treat. The hotel is as unique as mentioned in all the previous reviews.
reviews.title: Loved the sand room!

reviews.text: Just to add to the previous reviews..
reviews.title: Cool design and good location, but no attention to detail
A hotel for couples
reviews.text: We had plenty of toilet roll! No problems.
We were shown to our room by the hotel staff and shown the location of hairdyers etc.
reviews.title: Tourist hotel with funky design
more reservation problems
reviews.text: We flew to Berlin for one night as a romantic anniversary break.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was booked a month in advance and the confirmation email states an allocated check in time of 3pm.
reviews.title: Love Hotel Q!

reviews.text: On arrival at 3:30pm we were told that there had been a mistake in the booking and we would have to stay at a similar hotel in close proximity for the same price €180. This was upsetting and obviously had a negative impact on our stay.
reviews.title: Very cool Boutique Hotel

reviews.text: The 'similar' hotel was a chain hotel in the main tourist area 10 minutes away. There was no comparison in style or location.
reviews.title: Awful problems with reservation

reviews.text: There was no discount given for being moved and although the room was suggested as an upgrade to the room we had been allocated in hotel q I wonder why we had been allocated such a poor room in the first place ?
reviews.title: Modern wonder!
